GOD.content: secret letter becomes literature [Kafka] when it risks publicity, destinerrance, an archive to be inherited, when abandoned to its undecidability (is it the signature of father or son?)
GOD.linkedContent: secret letter becomes literature [Kafka] when it risks publicity, destinerrance, an archive to be inherited, when abandoned to its undecidability (is it the signature of father or son?)

GT.content: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)
GT.linkedContent: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)

MONL.content: political decision in writing & reading: inscribe undecidable (chance, terror) in ipseity of host, avoid temptation to make prior-to-the-first-language a language of the master (new master)
MONL.linkedContent: political decision in writing & reading: inscribe undecidable (chance, terror) in ipseity of host, avoid temptation to make prior-to-the-first-language a language of the master (new master)

R.content: undecidability, play, in the interpretation of the democratic
R.linkedContent: undecidability, play, in the interpretation of the democratic

R.content: because of undecidability linked to autoimmune logic, can never “prove” whether it’s more democratic to include/exclude immigrants, vote/not vote directly, both protect democracy through some exclusion, some renvoi
R.linkedContent: because of undecidability linked to autoimmune logic, can never “prove” whether it’s more democratic to include/exclude immigrants, vote/not vote directly, both protect democracy through some exclusion, some renvoi

R.content: democracy opens public space by granting change of tone (Weschsel der Töne), irony as well as fiction, simulacrum, secret, literature > this undecidability [“I continue to believe”] only radical possibility of letting/thinking what comes about by arriving of whoever arrives
R.linkedContent: democracy opens public space by granting change of tone (Weschsel der Töne), irony as well as fiction, simulacrum, secret, literature > this undecidability [“I continue to believe”] only radical possibility of letting/thinking what comes about by arriving of whoever arrives

OOG.content: Gödel discovered the rich possibility of “undecidable”
OOG.linkedContent: Gödel discovered the rich possibility of “undecidable”

OOG.content: [re: possible completeness of math, Derrida describes undecidable as incommensurable (“unique source of value vaster than the project of definiteness itself”), undecidable has negative value when taking its sense from decidability of geometrico-mathematical horizon]
OOG.linkedContent: [re: possible completeness of math, Derrida describes undecidable as incommensurable (“unique source of value vaster than the project of definiteness itself”), undecidable has negative value when taking its sense from decidability of geometrico-mathematical horizon]

OOG.content: “undecidability has a revolutionary and disconcerting sense, it is itself only if it remains essentially and intrinsically haunted in its sense of origin by the telos of decidability—whose disruption it marks” [undecidable: sense retains a sedimentary reference to antecedent sense, (see p. 51)]
OOG.linkedContent: “undecidability has a revolutionary and disconcerting sense, it is itself only if it remains essentially and intrinsically haunted in its sense of origin by the telos of decidability—whose disruption it marks” [undecidable: sense retains a sedimentary reference to antecedent sense, (see p. 51)]

FL.content: undecidable is not just oscillation between determinate rules that are equally imperative (equity and singularity) but the gauntlet every impossible decision delivers itself through
FL.linkedContent: undecidable is not just oscillation between determinate rules that are equally imperative (equity and singularity) but the gauntlet every impossible decision delivers itself through

FL.content: memory of undecidability must keep a living trace that forever marks a decision as such [is that possible? does that mark its death?]
FL.linkedContent: memory of undecidability must keep a living trace that forever marks a decision as such [is that possible? does that mark its death?]

FL.content: the undecidable remains caught, lodged, as a ghost, an essential ghost, in every decision, every event. The ghostliness deconstructs from within all assurance of presence
FL.linkedContent: the undecidable remains caught, lodged, as a ghost, an essential ghost, in every decision, every event. The ghostliness deconstructs from within all assurance of presence

FL.content: [re: Benjamin’s 2 violences] undecidable on each side: 1) divine: decision w/out decidable certainty 2) mythic: certainty of the undecidable w/out decision
FL.linkedContent: [re: Benjamin’s 2 violences] undecidable on each side: 1) divine: decision w/out decidable certainty 2) mythic: certainty of the undecidable w/out decision

LOBL.content: “in other words on living”: this “in other words” amasses powers of indecision & adds to utterance its capacity for skidding [see PAS]
LOBL.linkedContent: “in other words on living”: this “in other words” amasses powers of indecision & adds to utterance its capacity for skidding [see PAS]

LOBL.content: power of undecidability—another false name, rather than a pesudonym for difference, arrhythmic pulsation of the “word”
LOBL.linkedContent: power of undecidability—another false name, rather than a pesudonym for difference, arrhythmic pulsation of the “word”

LOBL.content: arrêt de mort: decision on what can’t be decided—it also arrests death by suspending it: gives “living on”
LOBL.linkedContent: arrêt de mort: decision on what can’t be decided—it also arrests death by suspending it: gives “living on”

LOBL.content: like death, arrêt remains undecidable, one arrêt marks delay, the other haste [2 syntaxes]
LOBL.linkedContent: like death, arrêt remains undecidable, one arrêt marks delay, the other haste [2 syntaxes]

LOBL.content: suspensive arrêt already [déjà] undecided because it suspends, decisive arrêt undecided because what it decides, death, la Chose, the neuter, is undecidability itself
LOBL.linkedContent: suspensive arrêt already [déjà] undecided because it suspends, decisive arrêt undecided because what it decides, death, la Chose, the neuter, is undecidability itself

AF.content: uncontrollable undecidability in axiomatics of both Freud & Heidegger when they use the word unheimlich
AF.linkedContent: uncontrollable undecidability in axiomatics of both Freud & Heidegger when they use the word unheimlich

SPOM.content: is a day infinitely foreign to vengeance [w/out it], heterogeneous at its source, to come or more ancient than memory itself? impossible to decide, today: “the time is out of joint”
SPOM.linkedContent: is a day infinitely foreign to vengeance [w/out it], heterogeneous at its source, to come or more ancient than memory itself? impossible to decide, today: “the time is out of joint”

SPOM.content: the commodity is blurred (embrouillé), tangled (embarrassant), aporetic, paralyzing, perhaps undecidable (ein sebr vertracktes Ding)
SPOM.linkedContent: the commodity is blurred (embrouillé), tangled (embarrassant), aporetic, paralyzing, perhaps undecidable (ein sebr vertracktes Ding)

POOF.content: those who snigger (ricanent) at undecidability (vertiginous convertability des contraires)—se croient très fort.
POOF.linkedContent: those who snigger (ricanent) at undecidability (vertiginous convertability des contraires)—se croient très fort.

POOF.content: perhaps as arrivant, arrivant of perhaps: at last the thought of perhaps (will come) > prevails over impossible, possibilization of possible impossible: undecidable and therefore decisive
POOF.linkedContent: perhaps as arrivant, arrivant of perhaps: at last the thought of perhaps (will come) > prevails over impossible, possibilization of possible impossible: undecidable and therefore decisive

POOF.content: btwn concept/event a double bind occurs, imposes itself to be endured there, law of an aporia, undecidability, crucial disjunction btwn thinking & knowing: gift, invention
POOF.linkedContent: btwn concept/event a double bind occurs, imposes itself to be endured there, law of an aporia, undecidability, crucial disjunction btwn thinking & knowing: gift, invention

POOF.content: at each instant discourse [Nietzsche’s] carried to its limit, on the edge of silence: transports itself beyond itself, hyperbolic, infinite build-up (surenchère), swept away by perhaps that undecides meaning in each decisive moment
POOF.linkedContent: at each instant discourse [Nietzsche’s] carried to its limit, on the edge of silence: transports itself beyond itself, hyperbolic, infinite build-up (surenchère), swept away by perhaps that undecides meaning in each decisive moment

POOF.content: language of madness, forced by most rigorous & profound necessity to say the insane, impossible, absurd, undecidable—to the disdain of philosophical good conscience (wants to hold out in shade of the Enlightenment): every “X without X” [i.e. “community w/out community”]
POOF.linkedContent: language of madness, forced by most rigorous & profound necessity to say the insane, impossible, absurd, undecidable—to the disdain of philosophical good conscience (wants to hold out in shade of the Enlightenment): every “X without X” [i.e. “community w/out community”]

POOF.content: we can’t exclude fact that when someone speaks they strive not to be understood, diabolical figure of death drive > so can the accord of hyperbolic lovence be possible, hoping to be understood beyond all dialectics, haunting (failure) must leave an imprint on the body it seems to threaten, merging indissociably, it’s impossible not to aspire to this haunting [a necessity]: instant of decision remains heterogenous, undecidable, crucial experience of perhaps
POOF.linkedContent: we can’t exclude fact that when someone speaks they strive not to be understood, diabolical figure of death drive > so can the accord of hyperbolic lovence be possible, hoping to be understood beyond all dialectics, haunting (failure) must leave an imprint on the body it seems to threaten, merging indissociably, it’s impossible not to aspire to this haunting [a necessity]: instant of decision remains heterogenous, undecidable, crucial experience of perhaps

MPM.content: undecidable is the condition of deconstruction (on and in [sur, dans?] this condition); in the sense of condition of possibility and, at the same time, condition as situation or destiny
MPM.linkedContent: undecidable is the condition of deconstruction (on and in [sur, dans?] this condition); in the sense of condition of possibility and, at the same time, condition as situation or destiny

MPM.content: this limit, this finitude, makes one write; deconstruction makes a path of writing through the aporia (impossible); deconstruction thinks only on the level of the impossible
MPM.linkedContent: this limit, this finitude, makes one write; deconstruction makes a path of writing through the aporia (impossible); deconstruction thinks only on the level of the impossible

MPM.content: there is no beyond-the-undecidable, remains to be thought, incalculable order of tout autre, there is no inside-the-undecidable, but an other (singular) memory calls us w/out leading us back to any anteriority > there never existed an older, more original “third term”
MPM.linkedContent: there is no beyond-the-undecidable, remains to be thought, incalculable order of tout autre, there is no inside-the-undecidable, but an other (singular) memory calls us w/out leading us back to any anteriority > there never existed an older, more original “third term”

A.content: mobile slash btwn and/or, and/and, or/and, or/or: a singular border, simultaneously disjunctive, conjunctive, undecidable
A.linkedContent: mobile slash btwn and/or, and/and, or/and, or/or: a singular border, simultaneously disjunctive, conjunctive, undecidable

A.content: the 3 reasons Heidegger’s authoritative decision on what must remain undecided seems so decisive: 1) superordinating of existential analytic 2) the originary, underivable character of death, of finitude, forces us to decide 3) prevalence of phenomenological tradition, pre-ferring, pre-férance [with an “a”], pre-archic originarity of proper, eigentlich
A.linkedContent: the 3 reasons Heidegger’s authoritative decision on what must remain undecided seems so decisive: 1) superordinating of existential analytic 2) the originary, underivable character of death, of finitude, forces us to decide 3) prevalence of phenomenological tradition, pre-ferring, pre-férance [with an “a”], pre-archic originarity of proper, eigentlich

A.content: decision to decide from “here” not simply methodological decision: decides that a method is pre-ferable to no-method, this absolute decision turns into non-decision since, as unconditional decision re: place/taking-place of decision, it relies on prevalence of what can’t be decided (i.e. death), leaving questions undecided, that would make one hesitate btwn decision/non-decision
A.linkedContent: decision to decide from “here” not simply methodological decision: decides that a method is pre-ferable to no-method, this absolute decision turns into non-decision since, as unconditional decision re: place/taking-place of decision, it relies on prevalence of what can’t be decided (i.e. death), leaving questions undecided, that would make one hesitate btwn decision/non-decision

A.content: that which would make decision object of thematic knowledge must remain undecidable for there to be a decision
A.linkedContent: that which would make decision object of thematic knowledge must remain undecidable for there to be a decision

PP.content: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself
PP.linkedContent: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself

PP.content: in Republic, we need a pharmakon (antidote) for poets, pharmakon is in combat zone btwn philosophy and itself, undecidable
PP.linkedContent: in Republic, we need a pharmakon (antidote) for poets, pharmakon is in combat zone btwn philosophy and itself, undecidable

PAS.content: [récit] btwn 2 affirmations, legendary suspense, in which the undecided lets itself be lured (se laisse attirer)
PAS.linkedContent: [récit] btwn 2 affirmations, legendary suspense, in which the undecided lets itself be lured (se laisse attirer)

PAS.content: Derrida questions himself about whether he hides a new economy, new mastery behind the undecidable > [responds] nothing that doesn’t expose itself & remove itself
PAS.linkedContent: Derrida questions himself about whether he hides a new economy, new mastery behind the undecidable > [responds] nothing that doesn’t expose itself & remove itself

PAS.content: ne-pas, not negation brought to bear on a position or a negation, but on “singular undecidability of the approach of the other”—unable to go nearer or father: suffice to disable every dialectical schema
PAS.linkedContent: ne-pas, not negation brought to bear on a position or a negation, but on “singular undecidability of the approach of the other”—unable to go nearer or father: suffice to disable every dialectical schema

SH.content: philosophy finds itself in vicinity of poetic, of literature, the blurred border (no place, utopia) btwn empirical (contingency of the outer) and necessary (necessity of inner) > indecision of this limit most provokes thought [Derrida attacks the idea that philosophy loses itself there]
SH.linkedContent: philosophy finds itself in vicinity of poetic, of literature, the blurred border (no place, utopia) btwn empirical (contingency of the outer) and necessary (necessity of inner) > indecision of this limit most provokes thought [Derrida attacks the idea that philosophy loses itself there]

FWT.content: risk decision by enduring undecidable: 2 contradictory imperatives
quaking of borders, their permeability, their undecidability [re: DP/suicide]
FWT.linkedContent: quaking of borders, their permeability, their undecidability [re: DP/suicide]

DS.content: double mark, mark erases mark, undecidable stroke > this syntax escapes pertinence of truth, inscribes truth w/in its play [“Mallarmé exemplifies this”—suspect such a claim]
DS.linkedContent: double mark, mark erases mark, undecidable stroke > this syntax escapes pertinence of truth, inscribes truth w/in its play [“Mallarmé exemplifies this”—suspect such a claim]

DS.content: dialectic is beginning and end of philosophy, Mallarmé marks it w/ his syntax at the point of its sterility [MOP] > a point that will be called, analogically, provisionally, undecidable
DS.linkedContent: dialectic is beginning and end of philosophy, Mallarmé marks it w/ his syntax at the point of its sterility [MOP] > a point that will be called, analogically, provisionally, undecidable

DS.content: perpetual allusion, which plays, performed in groundless entre—undecidable
DS.linkedContent: perpetual allusion, which plays, performed in groundless entre—undecidable

DS.content: undecidable, acc. Gödel, a proposition that can’t be deduced from given system of axioms, but doesn’t contradict them either > tertium datur, w/out synthesis
DS.linkedContent: undecidable, acc. Gödel, a proposition that can’t be deduced from given system of axioms, but doesn’t contradict them either > tertium datur, w/out synthesis

DS.content: [explanation on how syntax counts for “undecidability,” not lexical richness] hymen in text (crime, incest, suicide, simulacrum) inscribed at very tip (à la pointe) of indecision
DS.linkedContent: [explanation on how syntax counts for “undecidability,” not lexical richness] hymen in text (crime, incest, suicide, simulacrum) inscribed at very tip (à la pointe) of indecision

DS.content: syntax of hymen’s fold makes it impossible to arrest its play of indecision [i.e. to stop it on “mental,” or “imaginary”]
DS.linkedContent: syntax of hymen’s fold makes it impossible to arrest its play of indecision [i.e. to stop it on “mental,” or “imaginary”]

DS.content: if hymen constitutes itself as textual trace, if it always leaves something behind, it’s because its undecidability cuts it off from depending on any signified
DS.linkedContent: if hymen constitutes itself as textual trace, if it always leaves something behind, it’s because its undecidability cuts it off from depending on any signified

DS.content: (to be continued) in The Uncanny, Freud is most attentive to undecidable ambivalence, play of double, though he separates fictional uncanny from the feeling itself
DS.linkedContent: (to be continued) in The Uncanny, Freud is most attentive to undecidable ambivalence, play of double, though he separates fictional uncanny from the feeling itself

POS.content: displacement forms a system, undecidable resource sets system in motion: necessity of “blank spaces”
POS.linkedContent: displacement forms a system, undecidable resource sets system in motion: necessity of “blank spaces”

POS.content: Derrida’s undecidables, unities of simulacrum, “false” verbal properties that can’t be included in philosophical binary, but still inhabit it, resisting, disorganizing, w/out ever constituting a 3rd term, a solution: hymen, gram, incision, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, margin
POS.linkedContent: Derrida’s undecidables, unities of simulacrum, “false” verbal properties that can’t be included in philosophical binary, but still inhabit it, resisting, disorganizing, w/out ever constituting a 3rd term, a solution: hymen, gram, incision, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, margin

POS.content: “undecidable” not Hegelian contradiction, but, in rigorously Freudian sense, the unconscious of philosophical contradiction, which ignores contradiction, to extent that it belongs to speech, consciousness, discourse, presence, truth
POS.linkedContent: “undecidable” not Hegelian contradiction, but, in rigorously Freudian sense, the unconscious of philosophical contradiction, which ignores contradiction, to extent that it belongs to speech, consciousness, discourse, presence, truth

ROP.content: double bind at work on examples of all undecidable figures (hymen, pharmakon…), carry predicates incompatible btwn themselves, in their very btwn, interlacing, sumplukē, chiasmatic invagination > but each one, in its sumplukē, makes up a single trace [?]
ROP.linkedContent: double bind at work on examples of all undecidable figures (hymen, pharmakon…), carry predicates incompatible btwn themselves, in their very btwn, interlacing, sumplukē, chiasmatic invagination > but each one, in its sumplukē, makes up a single trace [?]

O.content: dissemination: doesn’t simply place plural in effervescence > il s’agite de la contradiction sans fin, marked by undecidable syntax of plus
O.linkedContent: dissemination: doesn’t simply place plural in effervescence > il s’agite de la contradiction sans fin, marked by undecidable syntax of plus

WAP.content: question has no critical status if its answer is undecidable (yes & no)
WAP.linkedContent: question has no critical status if its answer is undecidable (yes & no)

DPi.content: it is because my life is finite, “ended,” that I keep this relation to incalculability and undecidability as to the instant of my death
DPi.linkedContent: it is because my life is finite, “ended,” that I keep this relation to incalculability and undecidability as to the instant of my death

REST.content: thing hidden away, wrapped up underneath its investiture [abyss of ground]
REST.linkedContent: thing hidden away, wrapped up underneath its investiture [abyss of ground]

REST.content: the hiding or veiling, figure of the veil, is drawn into undecidability by the hymen
REST.linkedContent: the hiding or veiling, figure of the veil, is drawn into undecidability by the hymen

DST.content: un autre indécidable, the gap/hiatus in an undecidable derived from dialectical calculation/contraction, arrhythmic caesura as respiration of rhythm (this necessity awaits us) [pas, heartbeat] [Derrida here wonders if double bind is too dialectical, thus the other undecidable]
DST.linkedContent: un autre indécidable, the gap/hiatus in an undecidable derived from dialectical calculation/contraction, arrhythmic caesura as respiration of rhythm (this necessity awaits us) [pas, heartbeat] [Derrida here wonders if double bind is too dialectical, thus the other undecidable]

PIO.content: specularization paralyzes “Fable” (seems to freeze text)—undecidability of whether fabulous discourse makes it out of itself or is the very misfortune (malheurs) of the [possibility of the] mirror, infelicity of constative/performative (way they parasite each other)
PIO.linkedContent: specularization paralyzes “Fable” (seems to freeze text)—undecidability of whether fabulous discourse makes it out of itself or is the very misfortune (malheurs) of the [possibility of the] mirror, infelicity of constative/performative (way they parasite each other)

PJP.content: “invention” hesitates undecidably btwn creative and revelatory invention > perhaps btwn fiction/truth, lying/veracity, perjury/fidelity
PJP.linkedContent: “invention” hesitates undecidably btwn creative and revelatory invention > perhaps btwn fiction/truth, lying/veracity, perjury/fidelity

PSSS.content: Derrida evokes a beyond the death drive, beyond pleasure/reality principle, beyond drive for sovereign mastery, beyond cruelty—beyond the “mythology of drives” > the undecidable in psychoanalysis, the impossible other
PSSS.linkedContent: Derrida evokes a beyond the death drive, beyond pleasure/reality principle, beyond drive for sovereign mastery, beyond cruelty—beyond the “mythology of drives” > the undecidable in psychoanalysis, the impossible other

D.content: invisible column—undecidable, unmasterable in its height, uncontrollable in extension > unique & innumerable like what is called (the) present
D.linkedContent: invisible column—undecidable, unmasterable in its height, uncontrollable in extension > unique & innumerable like what is called (the) present

EL.content: responsibility on edge of double possibility, undecidability of das Geschlecht des Übergangs (generation of transition), entre-deux, “mi-lieu,” edge of abyss is same as above abyss [Derrida links to Heidegger’s anxiety, abyss, responsibility, Entschlossenheit (resoluteness)]
EL.linkedContent: responsibility on edge of double possibility, undecidability of das Geschlecht des Übergangs (generation of transition), entre-deux, “mi-lieu,” edge of abyss is same as above abyss [Derrida links to Heidegger’s anxiety, abyss, responsibility, Entschlossenheit (resoluteness)]

EL.content: question of decision & responsibility (that of our generation) returns (revient) to us out of (depuis) undecidable bottom, which is, au fond, undecidable
EL.linkedContent: question of decision & responsibility (that of our generation) returns (revient) to us out of (depuis) undecidable bottom, which is, au fond, undecidable

PPT.content: even if Derrida explained, narrated, what he wrote in The Truth In Painting, the indecision (the divided Prime Mover) he was trying to reduce would remain in the formalizing economy—each time overloaded (surchargée) w/ some supplement
PPT.linkedContent: even if Derrida explained, narrated, what he wrote in The Truth In Painting, the indecision (the divided Prime Mover) he was trying to reduce would remain in the formalizing economy—each time overloaded (surchargée) w/ some supplement

LI.content: dehiscence, botanical, divided opening, makes plant grow > law of undecidable contamination (like iterability)
LI.linkedContent: dehiscence, botanical, divided opening, makes plant grow > law of undecidable contamination (like iterability)

LI.content: economics that accounts for iterability, which questions traditional philosophy of oikos, of propre—can’t be separate from economy of Unconscious, of graphematics of undecidables
LI.linkedContent: economics that accounts for iterability, which questions traditional philosophy of oikos, of propre—can’t be separate from economy of Unconscious, of graphematics of undecidables

LI.content: undecidable calls for decision, for ethical-political responsibility beyond program, beyond calculable—even if it takes a second: experience and experiment of the undecidable > passage/trial of the undecidable
LI.linkedContent: undecidable calls for decision, for ethical-political responsibility beyond program, beyond calculable—even if it takes a second: experience and experiment of the undecidable > passage/trial of the undecidable

LI.content: pathos of undecidable cannot be symmetrically opposed to a pathos of “self-presence”
LI.linkedContent: pathos of undecidable cannot be symmetrically opposed to a pathos of “self-presence”

LI.content: no completeness possible for undecidablity: 1) resists binarity/triplicity 2) other defines limits of calculability 3) as third remains heterogenous to dialectic/calculable, opens field of decision, decidability
LI.linkedContent: no completeness possible for undecidablity: 1) resists binarity/triplicity 2) other defines limits of calculability 3) as third remains heterogenous to dialectic/calculable, opens field of decision, decidability

LI.content: undecidability (not “indeterminacy”) always a determinate oscillation btwn possibilities highly determined in strictly defined structures: difference of force in decision of writing (a word whose broad sense includes political action & experience in general) > no indecision or double bind w/out determination: occasionally, each side terribly necessary & irreplaceably singular
LI.linkedContent: undecidability (not “indeterminacy”) always a determinate oscillation btwn possibilities highly determined in strictly defined structures: difference of force in decision of writing (a word whose broad sense includes political action & experience in general) > no indecision or double bind w/out determination: occasionally, each side terribly necessary & irreplaceably singular

TN.content: Nancy thinks necessity of undecidables re: thought/weight > there will be identical/analogous necessity re: subject of touching
TN.linkedContent: Nancy thinks necessity of undecidables re: thought/weight > there will be identical/analogous necessity re: subject of touching

WOG.content: undecidability found a certain privilege in ‘Greek’ words, in philosophy, on [sur?] its borders, that is, beyond its confines [pharmakon, hymen, parergon]
WOG.linkedContent: undecidability found a certain privilege in ‘Greek’ words, in philosophy, on [sur?] its borders, that is, beyond its confines [pharmakon, hymen, parergon]

WOG.content: undecidability: condition and necessary passage for the decision
WOG.linkedContent: undecidability: condition and necessary passage for the decision

BSi.content: by its essence, every decision sovereign & exceptional, escapes order of the possible, the programmable, makes distinction btwn a deciding decision and an undecided one undecidable > supposed decision looks like indecision, nonintention, unconscious, irrational > sovereign looks like the beast
BSi.linkedContent: by its essence, every decision sovereign & exceptional, escapes order of the possible, the programmable, makes distinction btwn a deciding decision and an undecided one undecidable > supposed decision looks like indecision, nonintention, unconscious, irrational > sovereign looks like the beast

SPEC.content: PP btwn 2 limits of the w/out pleasure: stricture & discharge, preparation & end, desire & final fulfillment: liminary place of passage (hymen indécis pris dans l’anneau), le passage du pas: pleasure arrives only to erase itself
SPEC.linkedContent: PP btwn 2 limits of the w/out pleasure: stricture & discharge, preparation & end, desire & final fulfillment: liminary place of passage (hymen indécis pris dans l’anneau), le passage du pas: pleasure arrives only to erase itself

WBH.content: to say woman is on side of undecidability has only meaning of strategical phase, the side of woman becomes the side from which you begin to dismantle structure > but, as soon as you reach first stage of deconstruction, opposition man/woman no longer pertinent
WBH.linkedContent: to say woman is on side of undecidability has only meaning of strategical phase, the side of woman becomes the side from which you begin to dismantle structure > but, as soon as you reach first stage of deconstruction, opposition man/woman no longer pertinent

WBH.content: “woman” no longer best trope to refer to these things, same goes for undecidability itself!
WBH.linkedContent: “woman” no longer best trope to refer to these things, same goes for undecidability itself!

WBH.content: there’re many undecidables, one undecidability acts as a program, programming or unprogramming a program
WBH.linkedContent: there’re many undecidables, one undecidability acts as a program, programming or unprogramming a program
